item.title: About UbuCon Asia 2022
item.description: UbuCon Asia is an event organized by Ubuntu Communities in Asia. It’s for everyone who involved with or interested in Ubuntu, Linux and other Free and Open source technologies. It is also a place for Ubuntu people from Asia to connect, learn, and share their knowlegdes each other. UbuCon Asia 2022 will be the first In-person UbuCon Asia event. And It will be hold at Nuritkum Square (Nuri Dream Square) in Seoul, South Korea.
